data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Caripe, Jonathan Vera (2016): Leptalpheus pereirai sp. nov., a new alpheid shrimp from Panama and Venezuela (Decapoda: Caridea). Zootaxa 4127 (1): 185-191, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4127.1.11
